dal

The goal of DAL Toolbox is to provide a series data analytics functions organized as a framework. It supports data preprocessing, classification, regression, clustering, and time series prediction functions.

Installation

You can install the development version of DAL Toolbox from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cefet-rj-dal/daltoolbox", force=TRUE, dependencies=FALSE, upgrade="never", build_vignettes = TRUE)

Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

library(daltoolbox)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'daltoolbox'
